name: Knights Glory
description:
The gate to Hell has opened and released all sorts of dangerous monsters!
As the General of your army, your goal is simple. Defend the kingdom!

In each level, you have to place defenders and build your army. As you advanced you will unlock new warriors, archers, and special structures to assist you to hold back the enemy.

This game will test your ability to think fast, plan, and strategize how to set the correct defenders for each situation.
